verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, as he was <S%G4336>praying<s%> in a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G3973>ceased,<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> us to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> as <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3752>When<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> Our <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G37>Hallowed<s%> be your <S%G3686>name.<s%> Your <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%> Your <S%G2307>will<s%> be <S%G1096>done,<s%> as in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> in earth. <S%G1093><s%>
<S%G1325>Give<s%> us <S%G3588>day<s%> by <S%G3588>day<s%> our <S%G1967>daily<s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

For a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> in his <S%G3598>journey<s%> is <S%G3854>come<s%> to me, and I <S%G2192>have<s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3739><s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> him?

And he from <S%G2081>within<s%> shall <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2873>Trouble<s%> me not: the <S%G2374>door<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2808>shut,<s%> and my <S%G3813>children<s%> are with me in <S%G2845>bed;<s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> you.

I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1499>Though<s%> he will not <S%G1453>rise<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> him, <S%G1223>because<s%> he is his <S%G5384>friend,<s%> <S%G1065>yet<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of his <S%G335>importunity<s%> he will <S%G450>rise<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> him as <S%G3745>many<s%> as he needs. <S%G5535><s%>

For <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G154>asks<s%> <S%G2983>receives;<s%> and he that <S%G2212>seeks<s%> <S%G2147>finds;<s%> and to him that <S%G2925>knocks<s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

If a <S%G5207>son<s%> shall <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> of <S%G5100>any<s%> of you that is a <S%G3962>father,<s%> will he <S%G1929>give<s%> him a <S%G3037>stone?<s%> or if he ask a <S%G2486>fish,<s%> will he for a <S%G2486>fish<s%> <S%G1929>give<s%> him a serpent? <S%G3789><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G154>ask<s%> an <S%G5609>egg,<s%> will he <S%G1929>offer<s%> him a scorpion? <S%G4651><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> how to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children:<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall <S%G3588>your<s%> heavenly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to them that <S%G154>ask<s%> him?

But he, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> their <S%G1270>thoughts,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1266>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> is <S%G2049>brought<s%> to <S%G2049>desolation;<s%> and a house <S%G3624><s%> divided <S%G1909>against<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> falls. <S%G4098><s%>

He that is not with me is <S%G2596>against<s%> me: and he that <S%G4863>gathers<s%> not with me scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4198>goes<s%> he, and takes <S%G3880><s%> to him <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> more <S%G4191>wicked<s%> than <S%G1438>himself;<s%> and they <S%G1525>enter<s%> in, and <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1563>there:<s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G5501>worse<s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

And when the <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G1865>gathered<s%> thick <S%G1865>together,<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1074>generation:<s%> they <S%G1934>seek<s%> a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> and there shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> it, but the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonas<s%> the prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> when he has <S%G681>lighted<s%> a <S%G3088>candle,<s%> puts <S%G5087><s%> it in a <S%G2926>secret<s%> place, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G3426>bushel,<s%> but <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G3087>candlestick,<s%> that they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1531>come<s%> in may <S%G991>see<s%> the light. <S%G5338><s%>

But <S%G4133>rather<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1654>alms<s%> of such things as you <S%G1751>have;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G2513>clean<s%> to you.

But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you, <S%G5330>Pharisees!<s%> for you <S%G586>tithe<s%> <S%G2238>mint<s%> and <S%G4076>rue<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G3001>herbs,<s%> and <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>over<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> you to have <S%G4160>done,<s%> and not to <S%G863>leave<s%> the <S%G2548>other<s%> undone.

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5330>Pharisees!<s%> for you <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G4410>uppermost<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the markets. <S%G58><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you are as <S%G3419>graves<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G82>appear<s%> not, and the <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G4043>walk<s%> over <S%G1883><s%> them are not aware <S%G1492><s%> of them.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G3544>lawyers,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> you <S%G5195>reproach<s%> us <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you! for you <S%G3618>build<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulchers<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> them.

Therefore <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> I will <S%G649>send<s%> them <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and some of them they shall <S%G615>slay<s%> and persecute: <S%G1559><s%>

That the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1632>shed<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> may be <S%G1567>required<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> generation; <S%G1074><s%>
